title: The British Army’s Information Warfare Unit Is Helping Combat Coronavirus Misinformation
description: The UK's most senior officer revealed the '77th Brigade' are involved in the government's response to the virus.View Entire Post ›
content: While some information campaigns are openly the voice of the military, others are covert. These include those dedicated to counter-piracy, counter-insurgencies and counter-terrorism, the Wired story said, adding that almost half of the personnel were reservis… [+1322 chars]
